transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello Naveen sir, namaskar.
Customer: Ji, namaskar.
Executive: Kaise hain sir?
Customer: Haan, theek hai, bataiye.
Executive: Haan, main yeh jankari ke liye diya tha ki kal gaya tha sir, woh aapka uske liye download ke liye. Toh sir yeh review process ho chuka hai, matlab ek do process hote hain review ka. Yeh, yeh sir saari cheezein processing mein lag gayi hai. Moreover maan ke chaliye ki sir aaj kal mein ho jayenge aur jo bhi hoga sir aapko final matlab kitna kitna paisa aane wala hai, kitna woh hone wala hai, Monday ya Tuesday mein aapko mil jayega, theek hai sir? Kyunki Saturday Sunday off rehta hai sir. Isliye usme kuch working nahi ho payegi toh aaj kal mein.
Customer: Woh mere mein count mat kariyega Saturday Sunday.
Executive: Ah, nahi working day hi count hota hai sir, woh humse nahi count hota hai. Haan.
Customer: Nahi kyun per day jo aap, jo aap per day ka hisab nikaalte hain, woh toh 365 din ke hisab se nikaalte honge.
Executive: Haan, mujhe yahan tak umeed hai sir 365 ka hi nikaalte honge sir right. Abhi dekhiye sir aisa Naveen sir, Naveen sir dekhiye main as a jaise isme kaam kar raha hu, aisa nahi hai ki ek aapka yeh pehla case hai download ho raha hai right sir. Aise bahut saare cases aate hain hamare paas jo hum log karate hain right sir. Jo bhi cheezein hongi woh proper mail ke roop mein jayenge agar Saturday Sunday count hota hoga toh sabka hota hoga sir aisa nahi hai ki aapke specific case mein hoga.
Customer: Sabka hota hoga kya hota hoga mere ko usse nahi matlab hai na, main toh apni cheez dekhna chah raha hu ki bhai aapne apne end se humko kya relaxation diya?
Customer: Galti agar mere end se hui toh aap meri saari cheezein kariye. Agar galti aapke end se hai ya aap apni conditions ko fulfill nahi ho pa rahe hain aur uske baad bhi agar matlab paisa agar kaata ja raha hai toh phir yeh toh theek aisi cheez ho gayi ki maan lijiye maine aapko ek samaan becha, theek? ₹100 ka ek samaan maine aapko becha. Ab agar aapne kaha ji maine aapko is kisi condition mein samaan bechi ab woh cheez main nahi puri kar pa raha hu aapne kaha ki theek hai ji mera samaan aap wapas kar lijiye. Maine kaha theek hai. Ab jitne din aap mere ko samaan wapas kar ke denge main kahunga theek hai ji utne din ka paisa aapne kahenge ki yaar maine toh samaan ko use bhi nahi kiya, paisa ke waise seal band rakha hua hai.
Customer: Toh matlab woh justified nahi, baat bolne se nahi hota na ki aapki baat sahi hai.
Executive: Woh mere ko reflect kaise hoga?
Customer: Aap jo cheez, aap aap jo cheez keh rahe ho na sir woh ek specific aap product ki baat kar rahe ho sir yeh product nahi hai sir. Isme service hai sabki alag alag tarike se dekho sir pehle din se hi sabki costing jaari hogi sir. Aapke account pe sab logon ne kaam bhi kiya hoga sir. Right humne aapke liye.
Customer: Production team ne aapka product leke product lagaya hua hai.
Executive: Production team ne kaam kiya hai, bilkul kiya hai. Lekin, lekin, lekin at the end.
Customer: Ek minute pakad lo.
Executive: Lekin at the, at the end jo hai.
Customer: Lekin main aisa nahi keh sakta ki aapke saath aisa nahi hona chahiye.
Customer: Nahi main toh aap hi se baat kar raha hu na, main toh aap hi aap hi ko as a owner manta hu.
Executive: Ji, nahi boliye boliye.
Customer: Jab palla jhaadne wali baat aati hai toh aap kahenge ki main owner nahi hu. Jab, nahi meri baat suniye.
Executive: Nahi toh aapko Naveen sir bataunga sir. Rules regulations sirf, mere, mere main keh du ki Naveen sir aisa nahi hona chahiye aur woh nahi karenge.
Customer: Rules regulations jo hai, rules regulations jo hai sirf paise lene ke liye hote hain, matlab paise nahi lene ke liye hote hain jab paise dene hote hain toh saare rules regulations hote hain, hai na?
Executive: Kya matlab samjha nahi.
Customer: Yeh toh paisa deke matlab jab aapko kisi tarike se paisa chahiye hota hai, kaam chahiye hota hai kisi se toh koi rules regulations nahi hote lekin jab aapko us kaam ke badle mein kuch refund karna hota hai toh saare rules regulations niyam kanoon aa jaate hain na?
Executive: Accha toh is hisab se sir aap jo kehna chahte toh mujhe jaise ki yeh cheezein aapko batai gayi thi pehle ki agar refund hoga ya deduction hoga toh kaise hoga?
Customer: Refund ki toh koi baat hi nahi hui thi. Koi baat hi nahi hui thi refund ki na unhone bataya na maine, mere ko bhai main kyun kahunga ki main refund karunga. Unko cheezein describe karni chahiye aur describe unki toh baat hi chhod dijiye field aapke jo agent hai woh toh zero hain bilkul. Uske baad se aaj tak woh bande mere se mila nahi hai.
Executive: Call kiya tha shayad aapko ek din.
Customer: Phone maine kiya tha. Phone maine kiya tha uske baad unhone bola tha ki theek hai sir main ispe bolta hu aage karwata hu uske baad se do teen baar phone kiya phone pick nahi kiya phir uske baad se parallelly aapse baat ho rahi hai. Toh agar in case yeh toh chaliye chaliye refund wali baat aa rahi hai agar mere ko koi service chahiye hoti aapse ab toh yeh cheez zero ho jaati hai aapki service yahan pe.
Executive: Jab baat aati hai pehle priority pehle quality.
Customer: Nahi toh woh zero ho jaati hai phir kaat kyun rahe hain mere ko? Yeh mera kyun kaat rahe hain sir?
Executive: Ek cheez maine pehle din hi toh reflect kar diya tha sir aapko aisa bhi nahi hai Naveen sir kuch karna hota toh main rokta na aapko ki sir ho jayengi ho jayengi lekin maine saari cheezon ko judge kar liya tha Naveen sir ki aapke account pe jo aapki specific demand hai woh nahi hai isliye maine apne turant woh apne management se baat kiya upar baat kiya Naveen sir ke sir ke is case pe jo hai.
Customer: Aapne baat kiya aap sab kar rahe hain bahut accha kar rahe hain lekin mera usme nuksaan kyun ho raha hai?
Customer: Jo samay le rahe hain aap le rahe hain, jo samay kar rahe hain aap kar rahe hain, hai na?
Customer: Matlab mera toh usme involvement zero hai ek tarike se.
Customer: Matlab meri involvement nahi hai saari cheezein aap hi ke end se time lag raha hai toh jis din maine is cheez ko report kiya ki yeh cheez ab aap isko close kariye khatam kariye.
Executive: Haan priority basis pe hona chahiye aur specific basis pe hi.
Customer: Ab ab us din se agar aap 10 din aur le le lete hain ya jo bhi aapne time liya suppose, hai na? Saturday Sunday including ya sab kuch ya jo bhi aap aur Saturday Sunday bol rahe hain aap aur bhi jo time lenge toh woh saara ka saara per day ka toh value main hi chuka raha hu na?
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Kaun chuka raha hai? Aap woh phir bol sakte hain Saturday Sunday aap ghar mein jo baith ke chai matlab pee sakte hain apne family ke saath, hai na? Nuksaan us chai ka kaun bhar raha hai?
Customer: Hmm, samajh gaya. Aap kehna kya chahte hain toh dekho sir aap.
Customer: Main yahi kehna chah raha hu ki matlab maine as a aapke, aapke level pe baat sunu sir dekhiye sir main yahan pe aapke level pe hi matlab din bhar mein management se do teen baar bhi jaata hu sir aapke report ke liye.
Customer: Main aapke efforts ke liye main, main doubt nahi kar raha hu Manish ji. Mere ko nahi pata aap ho sakta hai ki bahut accha effort kar rahe hain lekin.
Executive: Unka bhi ek process bhi hai sir hierarchy yeh log follow kar rahe hain mujhe pata hai.
Customer: Main main keh raha hu aap hierarchy follow kariye lekin main bas yeh chahta hu ki jis din maine aapse bol diya ki mera yeh account close kariye, hai na?
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Us din se ab meri cheezein mat aap count kariye day. Aap us din tak ki count rakhiye, hai na? Ki theek hai is is is date ko clear hua hai ab woh aapke internal process mein jaata hai Saturday Sunday padta hai 10 din padta hai bhukamp aata hai baad aati hai uske liye main kyun pay karu?
Executive: Samajh gaya matlab yeh cheez main ek baar management ko aage bhi karunga ki aage se aise kuch cases ho rahe toh iske prati kripya.
Customer: Aap aage karenge kya karenge mujhe usse nahi matlab hai main kyun suffer karu us cheez ka. Aapke liye aage ke liye, aage ke liye aap isko jo karna ho kariyega. Mere ko yeh cheez galat lag rahi hai toh main aapse point out kar raha hu seedhi si cheez hai.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul bilkul sir matlab main.
Customer: Mere paas update aaya tha sir ki saari cheezein ho gayi hai moreover sir aapka aaj ya kal mein saari cheezein disclose ho jayengi aur Monday ko aapko.
Customer: Mujhe nahi pata main kya keh raha hu mere account mein jab tak paisa nahi aata mujhe toh us cheez ko main nahi maan sakta na. Aap mujhe mail dikhate rahiye aap mujhe conversations dikhate rahiye mujhe kis cheez se matlab hai?
Customer: Jab hamare aapke beech ki cheezein clear nahi hui toh mujhe apne refund ki value se matlab hai. Aap jitna refund ki value mujhe minus kar ke denge mere liye woh utna hi nuksaan galat cheez hai nuksaan mere liye utna hi galat hai.
Customer: Hmm, nuksaan galat hai wohi main keh raha hu nuksaan hai.
Customer: Jab jis din final ho gaya ki ab is cheez ko nahi karna jo ki already teen din pehle chaar din pehle ho chuka hai.
Executive: Haan sir aisa matlab hona chahiye matlab hona chahiye ki turant aa jaata hai.
Customer: Chaar din yeh aur teen din yeh in ek hafte ki almost jo value hai main kyun main pay kar raha hu?
Executive: Hmm hmm bilkul bilkul aapne jo hume bataya tha sir ek minute aapki date bhi check kar lijiye.
Executive: Hamari jo meeting hui thi hum us din se count karenge sir. Main dekh leta hu.
Customer: Aap usi din se aap aap usse usse pehle jo bhi din gaya hai aap usko count kar lijiye chaliye theek hai main itna chhod lekin ab pata chala ki jis din tak amount nahi nahi hota release aap us din tak agar count karenge toh yeh toh phir galat hai na?
Customer: Time aap lagayenge suffer kaun karega main karunga.
Executive: Haan wohi theek keh rahe hain aap paanch se saat din ho gaya sir theek hai. Message main bhej bhi kar raha hu sir aap is cheez ko woh leke worried mat rahiye sir.
Customer: Dekh lijiye worried kya main apni baat aapse rakh raha hu, hai na? Aap kya efforts kar rahe hain woh ab.
Executive: Main bilkul dekho sir main aapko daily call karta Naveen sir itna toh aap jaante hi hain sir right main aapko jo bhi mere management se.
Customer: Manish ji maine aapse abhi kya kaha? Maine yeh kaha ki mujhe aap effort jo laga rahe hain maine usse doubt nahi kiya na main kar raha hu.
Executive: Aur saath hi aapne is cheez ko bhi notice kiya hoga Naveen sir maine aapko kisi prakar ki koi dilasa nahi dikhai ki maine is is prakar ki aapki requirement.
Customer: Main aapka case samajh gaya tha main case aapka samajh gaya tha isliye main turant karwa diya.
Customer: Personally main aapse koi woh nahi kar raha hu main bas apni cheez ek aapko convey kar raha hu usme jo genuine hai main wohi aapse keh raha hu, hai na? Hamare aapke beech ki settlement nahi hui toh jis din se hamari final hua hai us din se yeh date ka jab tak settlement nahi hota aap settlement mein 10 din le lijiye mujhe koi problem nahi hai lekin agar aap is tarike se kahenge ki jis din settlement ka woh hamara confirmation rahega toh aap agar us din tak count karne wale hain mujhe nahi pata aapki kya policy hai, hai na? Toh phir yeh matlab mere ke liye phir sirf matlab sir dard hi hai, hai na?
Customer: Yeh galat cheez hai is tarike se agar settlement ho raha hai toh baaki maine aapko bata diya aap isko dekh lijiyega, theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai okay sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants relaxation for the delay from IndiaMART.

- Objects to being charged for weekends during processing.

- Questions the value of services.



Resolution:

- Executive assured resolution in a few days.

- Executive stated working days are only counted.

- Executive will forward concerns to management.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, service, delay, weekend
